Supply ChainSetting aggressive goals and rallying the company towards a common vision has driven Seagate’s 
strong Health and Safety programs. The foundation for our strategy is the belief that all work-related incidents are preventable, along with our commitment to maintain employee health and productivity.
Through our managers’ and employees’ accountability for safety, Seagate has achieved a 94% reduction in work-related injury and illness rates over the past seven years. The integration and use of Six Sigma tools and methodologies in addition to the expanded use of IT applications have further enabled the reduction of health and safety risks.
